p: L. stoechas essential-oil bioactive-compounds were identified by the GC–MS technique and presented in Table 1. In this respect, thirty-two compounds have been identified. The main components are: D-Fenchone (29.28%), α-pinene (23.18%) and camphor (15.97%). These cyclic compounds belong essentially to the family of oxygenated monoterpenes known for their antioxidant and free radical scavengers.
